title: Dockerfile Creation
description: Build custom Docker images using Dockerfile instructions
objective: Create a Dockerfile for a Node.js application and build an image
hints: Start with a base image using FROM
Use WORKDIR to set the working directory
COPY transfers files into the image
solution:
cat > Dockerfile << EOF
FROM node:18-alpine
WORKDIR /app
COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm install
COPY . .
CMD ["npm", "start"]
EOF

docker build -t my-node-app .
